Pakistan Institute of Engineering and Ap: The Pakistan Institute of Engineering and Applied Sciences (PIEAS), (پاکستان انسٹی ٹیوٹ آف انجینئرنگ اینڈ اپلائیڈ سائنسز) is a public research university located in Islamabad, Pakistan. The university is modelled on international standards with a strong focus on the scientific advancement of the nuclear science-related STEM fields.[1]
